import React,{useRef,useEffect,useState}from"react";import"../styles/SwipableInsights.css";/**
 * SwipableInsights
 * - Mobile-first horizontal swipable cards
 * - Uses native scrolling + scroll-snap for smooth behaviour on mobile
 * - Dots reflect the currently visible card
 *
 * Replace icons/images in `cards` as needed (public folder paths used).
 */import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function SwipableInsights(){const cards=[{id:"i1",icon:process.env.PUBLIC_URL+"/star.png",big:"4.8/5",text:"Our average review rating on Google and on Social platforms",bg:"#BFB7FF"// optional per-card tint
},{id:"i2",icon:process.env.PUBLIC_URL+"/thirty.png",big:"35%",text:"The number of CarsDedo customers that are referrals",bg:"#BFB7FF"},{id:"i3",icon:process.env.PUBLIC_URL+"/sard.png",big:"> 70%",text:"People who've become customers after their first test drive",bg:"#BFB7FF"},{id:"i4",icon:process.env.PUBLIC_URL+"/wom.png",big:"32%",text:"Our women customer quotient",bg:"#BFB7FF"}];const viewportRef=useRef(null);const[active,setActive]=useState(0);// update active index while user scrolls
useEffect(()=>{if(!viewportRef.current)return;const el=viewportRef.current;const onScroll=()=>{const scrollLeft=el.scrollLeft;const cardWidth=el.firstElementChild?el.firstElementChild.getBoundingClientRect().width+// width
parseFloat(getComputedStyle(el.firstElementChild).marginRight||0):el.clientWidth;// calculate index with rounding to nearest integer
const idx=Math.round(scrollLeft/(cardWidth||el.clientWidth));setActive(Math.min(Math.max(idx,0),cards.length-1));};// run once to set initial active
onScroll();el.addEventListener("scroll",onScroll,{passive:true});return()=>el.removeEventListener("scroll",onScroll);},[cards.length]);// helper to programmatically snap to a card (used if you want prev/next)
const goTo=i=>{const el=viewportRef.current;if(!el)return;const card=el.children[i];if(!card)return;const left=card.offsetLeft-parseFloat(getComputedStyle(el).paddingLeft||0);el.scrollTo({left,behavior:"smooth"});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{className:"si-section","aria-label":"Insights that drive us",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"si-heading",children:"Insights That Drive Us"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"si-viewport-wrap",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"si-viewport",ref:viewportRef,children:cards.map((c,i)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("article",{className:"si-card",role:"group","aria-roledescription":"slide","aria-label":"".concat(i+1," of ").concat(cards.length),style:{backgroundColor:c.bg},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"si-card-inner",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"si-icon-wrap",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:c.icon,alt:"",className:"si-icon"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"si-text-wrap",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"si-big",children:c.big}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"si-desc",children:c.text})]})]})},c.id))})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"si-dots",role:"tablist","aria-label":"Slide navigation",children:cards.map((_,i)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"si-dot ".concat(i===active?"active":""),onClick:()=>goTo(i),"aria-label":"Go to slide ".concat(i+1),"aria-pressed":i===active},i))})]});}
